job_details.Vacaturetitel: Junior Software Developer | €3250 - €3750 bruto per maand
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
AssistYou is looking for a talented, enthusiastic Junior Software Developer to join their team. This is a great opportunity to develop your technical skills. Forget about building webshops; you will be learning how to implement and apply LLM's & other AI-based technologies to create outstanding Digital Hosts for some of the most well-known Dutch and European companies. Focused on voice-based channels (i.e., telephony), you will work with streaming data, real-time processing, AI & Cloud Computing. Read on to discover why this challenge awaits you., * Designing and Coding outstanding Digital Hosts for our Enterprise companies.
     * Working with Customer Engineers to implement connectivity between our platform and their systems.
     * Investigating, evaluating & fine-tuning the performance of our Digital Hosts
     * Helping come-up with and implement improvements to our platform based on customer learnings.
     * Joining sales meetings to consult on technical matters and come-up with the smartest way to achieve a customer's goal using our technology.
job_details.full_text:
Junior Software Developer | €3250 - €3750 bruto per maand

AssistYou is looking for a talented, enthusiastic Junior Software Developer to join their team. This is a great opportunity to develop your technical skills. Forget about building webshops; you will be learning how to implement and apply LLM's & other AI-based technologies to create outstanding Digital Hosts for some of the most well-known Dutch and European companies. Focused on voice-based channels (i.e., telephony), you will work with streaming data, real-time processing, AI & Cloud Computing. Read on to discover why this challenge awaits you., * Designing and Coding outstanding Digital Hosts for our Enterprise companies.
     * Working with Customer Engineers to implement connectivity between our platform and their systems.
     * Investigating, evaluating & fine-tuning the performance of our Digital Hosts
     * Helping come-up with and implement improvements to our platform based on customer learnings.
     * Joining sales meetings to consult on technical matters and come-up with the smartest way to achieve a customer's goal using our technology.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the implementation and application of LLMs and other AI-based technologies to create 'Digital Hosts', which aligns directly with the definition of a GenAI Engineer. The core responsibilities mentioned, such as fine-tuning performance, working with streaming and real-time data for voice-based channels, and developing AI-powered solutions, are all key indicators of this profile. While software development is involved, the primary focus is on leveraging generative AI models.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'implement and apply LLM's & other AI-based technologies' directly relates to the core process of using and adapting AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: implement and apply LLM's & other AI-based technologies

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Investigating, evaluating & fine-tuning the performance of our Digital Hosts' indicates direct work on optimizing and adapting AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: Investigating, evaluating & fine-tuning the performance of our Digital Hosts

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Designing and Coding outstanding Digital Hosts' points to the software development aspect of building applications around AI.
job_tasks.phrase: Designing and Coding outstanding Digital Hosts

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'implement connectivity between our platform and their systems' involves integrating AI solutions with existing infrastructure, a software development task.
job_tasks.phrase: implement connectivity between our platform and their systems

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'implement improvements to our platform' suggests ongoing software development and enhancement of the AI-driven system.

The phrase 'Joining sales meetings to consult on technical matters and come-up with the smartest way to achieve a customer's goal using our technology' shows an understanding of business needs and aligning technical solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: Joining sales meetings to consult on technical matters and come-up with the smartest way to achieve a customer's goal using our technology

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'AI & Cloud Computing' implies the need for operational aspects related to deploying and managing AI systems in the cloud.

soft_skills.phrase: learning how to implement and apply LLM's & other AI-based technologies
come-up with the smartest way to achieve a customer's goal
Helping come-up with and implement improvements to our platform
